data.title: How much do Spectrasonics employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Spectrasonics is estimated to be approximate $50 per year. The majority pay is between $44 to $56 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Spectrasonics salary, Spectrasonics pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Spectrasonics by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Spectrasonics jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the hourly salary range of different positions at Spectrasonics. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Manager, Software jobs at Spectrasonics earn the most with an average hourly salary of $72, while Executive Assistant & Receptionist jobs earn the least with an average hourly salary of $24.

The estimate average salary for Spectrasonics employees is around $50 per hour. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $56. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

JOB TITLE hourly SALARY RANGE AVERAGE hourly SALARY COMPANY NAME Manager, Software $66 - $78 $72 Spectrasonics Manager, Production $48 - $62 $55 Spectrasonics Frontend Web Developer $47 - $52 $49 Spectrasonics Executive Assistant $36 - $44 $40 Spectrasonics Product Specialist $26 - $33 $29 Spectrasonics Executive Assistant & Receptionist $22 - $27 $24 Spectrasonics

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Spectrasonics in the United States pay?

Spectrasonics pays its employees an average of $50 per hour. The average salary at Spectrasonics range from $44 to $56 per hour. Manager, Software jobs at Spectrasonics earn the most with an average hourly salary of $72, while Executive Assistant & Receptionist jobs earn the least with an average hourly salary of $24.

2. Do Spectrasonics employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Spectrasonics is lesser than Passware O. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Spectrasonics is $56 per hour, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Passware O is $62 per hour.

3. How much does Spectrasonics pay compared to Passware O?

The average hourly salary at Spectrasonics is $50, in comparison to Passware O which pays $55 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost an Executive Assistant salary at Spectrasonics?

Administrative Support, Scheduling and Presentation are key to an Executive Assistant job at Spectrasonics. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Spectrasonics.

5. What is the lowest salary at Spectrasonics?

The lowest paying job at Spectrasonics is Executive Assistant & Receptionist with an hourly salary of $24.
